overview:
The “technical” founder of CommuniTeach, Ben Paul is also the successful founder of a web design company and a graduate student in Clinical Psychology.

Ben has constructed creative websites for musicians, artists, and nonprofit organizations. He constructed the beta version of communiteach.com and is currently managing a team of web developers to provide further development. Through his experience as a Psychology researcher, Ben has acquired an understanding of determinants of human behavior that has proven helpful to developing effective marketing strategies.
